text: Eroica (released in some territories as Heroism) is a 1958 Polish World War II movie directed by Andrzej Munk and starring Edward Dziewoński, Tadeusz Łomnicki, Michał Szewczyk, Barbara Połomska, Ignacy Machowski, Leon Niemczyk, Henryk Bak, Kazimierz Rudzki. ==Other websites== * Category:1958 war movies Category:Polish movies Category:World War II movies
title: Eroica (1958 movie)
